name: Kahn
description:
Sling the ball upwards and don't make it fall!

Controls

Click and drag the mouse anywhere to sling the ball

Development

After several failed attempts on getting a somewhat original idea given the theme, I settled for a very simple concept and even simpler graphics, creating my first hypercasual-styled game. Considering that I developed everything on the last day of the jam,  I'm quite happy with the final result, as for once I managed to "find the fun" correctly (the game was very differently when I first thought of it) while also managing to gave a good amount of juice, although still lacking more visual variety in my opinion.

Some of the ideas that were scrapped due to lack of time were powerups, enemies (?), different kinds of platforms and more ways to get points.

Known bugs
  • The background music does not loop
Credits
  • Me: programming, "art", sounds (using bfxr)
  • Soundtrack: Hyperflight Racing by cynicmusic
  • Palette: Nightfall in the City by Interprete-me
  • Font:  Broken Crush by Artefak Project
  • Ideas, support during brain meltdowns and being cute:  brioschi
  • Extensive playtesting and being best bros: Gianluca and Lorenzo

Created for ScoreJam #22 - Theme: Falling
